name: 何思慧　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: This course aims to enhance communicative competence with special emphasis on entrepreneurial thinking and professional English skills. Students will be learning concepts about entrepreneurship and business, including marketing skills, business plans, and so on. The course will be focusing on communication skills and vocabulary building. Class activities include class discussion, group discussion, presentation and so on. Students are required to express their thoughts in English during the class.
